scripts.docker-publish-local-test: cp ../environment.regtest.ts app/config/environment.ts && cp -r ../nginx . && nuxt generate && docker build -t ef-onsite . && docker image tag ef-onsite rakanhowls/ef-onsite:regtest && sudo docker push rakanhowls/ef-onsite:regtest
scripts.docker-publish-local-live: cp ../environment.reglive.ts app/config/environment.ts && cp -r ../nginx . && nuxt generate && docker build -t ef-onsite . && docker image tag ef-onsite rakanhowls/ef-onsite:reglive && sudo docker push rakanhowls/ef-onsite:reglive
